00043 namespace birdseed

00045 namespace dev
00046 {
00047     // Result for a single sample-SNP combination
00048     struct CallAndConfidence
00049     {
00050         // For haploid, the call will be either AA or BB.  Only the first two positions of pvalues will be set to something meaningful.
00051         
00052         // Counter-intuitively, BB=0, and AA=2, despite the positions of AA & BB in the priors and other data structures.
00053         enum Call {BB = 0, AB = 1, AA = 2, NOCALL = 3};
00054         Call call;
00055         double confidence;
00056         double pvalues[MAX_NUM_CLUSTERS];
00057         bool isDiploid;
00058         
00059         
00060         CallAndConfidence(Call call, double confidence, const double pxi_zj[MAX_NUM_CLUSTERS], bool isDiploid):
00061             call(call),
00062             confidence(confidence),
00063             pvalues(),
00064             isDiploid(isDiploid)
00065         {
00066             for (size_t i = 0; i < MAX_NUM_CLUSTERS; ++i) {
00067                 pvalues[i] = pxi_zj[i];
00068             }
00069         }
00070     };
00071 
00072     class GenotypeCaller
00073     {
00074       public:
00075         virtual ~GenotypeCaller(){}
00076 
00077         // Iterate through the call for each sample, in the order they appear in the IntensityMatrix.
00078         virtual CallAndConfidence nextCall() = 0;
00079     };
00080     
00081     
00082     // Calls all the samples for a single SNP.
00083     class BasicGenotypeCaller: public GenotypeCaller
00084     {
00085       private:
00086         std::vector<CallAndConfidence> calls;
00087         size_t index;
00088     
00089       public:
00090         // Do the calling for a SNP.
00091         BasicGenotypeCaller(const IntensityMatrix &intensities,
00092                             const Priors &priors,
00093                             double correctionFactor,
00094                             const std::string &priorName,
00095                             int verbosity = 0,
00096                             std::ostream *clusterOstrm = NULL);
00097 
00098         // Iterate through the call for each sample, in the order they appear in the IntensityMatrix.
00099         CallAndConfidence nextCall()
00100         {
00101             return calls[index++];
00102         }
00103     };
00104 
00105     // Returns NO CALL for every sample
00106     class DummyGenotypeCaller: public GenotypeCaller
00107     {
00108       private:
00109         static double pvalues[MAX_NUM_CLUSTERS];
00110         bool isDiploid;
00111       public:
00112         DummyGenotypeCaller(bool isDiploid):
00113             isDiploid(isDiploid)
00114         {}
00115         
00116         CallAndConfidence nextCall();
00117     };
00118     
00119     // Make calls based on clusters that are specified rather than calculated
00120     class ForcedClusterGenotypeCaller: public GenotypeCaller
00121     {
00122       private:
00123         std::vector<CallAndConfidence> calls;
00124         size_t index;
00125     
00126       public:
00127         // Do the calling for a SNP.
00128         ForcedClusterGenotypeCaller(const IntensityMatrix &intensities,
00129                                     const Clusters &clusters,
00130                                     double correctionFactor,
00131                                     const std::string &priorName,
00132                                     int verbosity = 0,
00133                                     std::ostream *clusterOstrm = NULL);
00134 
00135         // Iterate through the call for each sample, in the order they appear in the IntensityMatrix.
00136         CallAndConfidence nextCall()
00137         {
00138             return calls[index++];
00139         }
00140     };
00141 
00142     template<class PRIORS, class PRIORSREADER, class GENOTYPECALLER>
00143         class GenderAwareGenotypeCallerTemplate: public GenotypeCaller
00144     {
00145       public:
00146         GenderAwareGenotypeCallerTemplate(const IntensityMatrix &intensities,
00147                                   const std::vector<Gender> &genders,
00148                                           PRIORSREADER *priorsReader,
00149                                   const char *snpName,
00150                                   double correctionFactor,
00151                                           int verbosity=0,
00152                                           std::ostream *clusterOstrm = NULL);
00153         
00154         // Iterate through the call for each sample, in the order they appear in the IntensityMatrix.
00155         CallAndConfidence nextCall();
00156       private:
00157         std::vector<Gender> genders;
00158         std::auto_ptr<GenotypeCaller> femaleCaller;
00159         std::auto_ptr<GenotypeCaller> maleCaller;
00160         std::vector<Gender>::const_iterator genderIt;
00161     };
00162 
00163     
00164     template<class PRIORS, class PRIORSREADER, class GENOTYPECALLER>
00165     inline GenderAwareGenotypeCallerTemplate<PRIORS, PRIORSREADER, GENOTYPECALLER>::
00166     GenderAwareGenotypeCallerTemplate(const IntensityMatrix &intensities,
00167                                       const std::vector<Gender> &genders,
00168                                       PRIORSREADER *priorsReader,
00169                                       const char *snpName,
00170                                       double correctionFactor,
00171                                       int verbosity,
00172                                       std::ostream *clusterOstrm):
00173         genders(genders),
00174         genderIt(this->genders.begin())
00175     {
00176         const PRIORS *priors;
00177         if (!priorsReader->ploidyDiffersByGender(snpName) || genders.empty()) {
00178             priors = priorsReader->getPriorsForSNP(snpName);
00179             if (priors != NULL) {
00180                 std::string priorName;
00181                 priorName = priorsReader->getPriorName(snpName);
00182                 femaleCaller.reset(new GENOTYPECALLER(intensities, *priors, correctionFactor, priorName,
00183                                                       verbosity, clusterOstrm));
00184             } else {
00185                 femaleCaller.reset(new DummyGenotypeCaller(true));
00186             }
00187         } else {
00188             if (intensities.numRows() != genders.size()) {
00189                 throw BroadException("Mismatch between intensities.numRows() and genders.size()", __FILE__, __LINE__);
00190             }
00191 
00192             // Reserve the max # of elements in intensity matrices to avoid extra mallocing & copying
00193             IntensityMatrix maleIntensities(0, intensities.numRows());
00194             IntensityMatrix femaleIntensities(0, intensities.numRows());
00195 
00196             for (size_t i = 0; i < intensities.numRows(); ++i) {
00197                 if (genders[i] == GENDER_MALE) {
00198                     maleIntensities.push_back(intensities[i]);
00199                 } else {
00200                     assert(genders[i] == GENDER_FEMALE || genders[i] == GENDER_UNKNOWN);
00201                     femaleIntensities.push_back(intensities[i]);
00202                 }
00203             }
00204             if (femaleIntensities.numRows() > 0) {
00205                 priors = priorsReader->getPriorsForSNP(snpName, GENDER_FEMALE);
00206                 if (priors != NULL) {
00207                     std::string priorName;
00208                     priorName = priorsReader->getPriorName(snpName, GENDER_FEMALE);
00209                     femaleCaller.reset(new GENOTYPECALLER(femaleIntensities,
00210                                                           *priors,
00211                                                           correctionFactor,
00212                                                           priorName,
00213                                                           verbosity,
00214                                                           clusterOstrm));
00215                 } else {
00216                     femaleCaller.reset(new DummyGenotypeCaller(true));
00217                 }
00218             }
00219             if (maleIntensities.numRows() > 0) {
00220                 priors = priorsReader->getPriorsForSNP(snpName, GENDER_MALE);
00221                 if (priors != NULL) {
00222                     std::string priorName;
00223                     priorName = priorsReader->getPriorName(snpName, GENDER_MALE);
00224                     maleCaller.reset(new GENOTYPECALLER(maleIntensities,
00225                                                         *priors,
00226                                                         correctionFactor,
00227                                                         priorName,
00228                                                         verbosity,
00229                                                         clusterOstrm));
00230                 } else {
00231                     maleCaller.reset(new DummyGenotypeCaller(false));
00232                 }
00233             }
00234         }
00235     }
00236 
00237     template<class PRIORS, class PRIORSREADER, class GENOTYPECALLER>
00238     inline
00239     CallAndConfidence GenderAwareGenotypeCallerTemplate<PRIORS, PRIORSREADER, GENOTYPECALLER>::nextCall()
00240     {
00241         if (maleCaller.get() == NULL) {
00242             return femaleCaller->nextCall();
00243         } else if (*genderIt++ == GENDER_MALE) {
00244             return maleCaller->nextCall();
00245         } else {
00246             return femaleCaller->nextCall();
00247         }
00248     }
00249 
00250     typedef GenderAwareGenotypeCallerTemplate<Priors, PriorsReader, BasicGenotypeCaller> GenderAwareGenotypeCaller;
00251     typedef GenderAwareGenotypeCallerTemplate<Clusters, ClustersReader, ForcedClusterGenotypeCaller>
00252         GenderAwareForcedClusterGenotypeCaller;
00253 };
00254 };
00255

00257 #endif /* _GENOTYPECALLER_H */
